TATDYLF is a tool that allows you to connect to your android phone, and control some of its functions, from your computer. This application allows you to modify various aspects of your phone status, such as the volume, whether it is on silent or vibrate mode, and will even allow you to locate your phone and send text messages! Use this application to help find a lost phone, or just as a convenience.
